titles: A treatise of the perpetuall visibilitie, and succession of the true church in all ages
author: Abbot, George, 1562-1633.
publisher: Printed by Humfrey Louunes, for Robert Milbourne,
notes: Attributed to Abbot, Abp. of Canterbury, by STC (2nd ed.) and NUC pre-1956 imprints.
